metadata.title: CVE-2019-17561 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The "Apache NetBeans" autoupdate system does not fully validate codesignatures. An attacker could modify the downloaded nbm and includeadditional code. "Apache NetBeans" versions up to and including 11.2 areaffected by this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: netbeans: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
